        public void testEncodedLengths()
                        throws java.sql.SQLException,
                               java.io.IOException
        The length of a binary type is encoded when stored, this test makes sure all the code paths are tested. The encoded length is hidden from the JDBC client.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.io.IOException
